website_summaries.verdict: An attractive waterproof case for newer iPhones that has earned both satisfied customers and some complaints of unreliable performance.
pros: Gives options to owners of several of the latest iPhone models because it's available in sizes to fit the 7, 8, 7 Plus, and 8 Plus
Owners brag about the thin, transparent design
cons: Has been known to fail the water test recommended by the company
Some owners say voices are clear

customer_reviews.title: Very impressed with the customer service
customer_reviews.text: I had purchased this case prior and after doing the waterproof test noticed a tiny pin hole. I was able to return the product with no hassles and got a refund the moment the UPS scanned it in to return. Because of their great service I decided to give them another try. And I’m glad that I did. I got the new one within two days. This one pasted the water test. It fits perfectly and after going swimming it withheld from the water entering. Will buy again when I change my phone.
customer_reviews.author: Kay Sal

customer_reviews.title: Poor call sound quality with this case
customer_reviews.text: We were hoping for so much better from this. When you call a phone with this case, the sound is muffled and inconsistent. You can hear on the phone with the case ok but the voice sounds so poor for the other caller. Didn’t bother to do a paper test of the waterproof abilities after that.
customer_reviews.author: GARY D.

customer_reviews.title: HIGHLY RECOMMEND 100 stars!!
customer_reviews.text: I put my phone in this case when I went canoing. I accidentally dropped my phone in the water and couldn’t find it so we kept going. 2 days later a stranger found my phone, plugged it in to charge it, my phone still worked so he contacted me using the phone number in my phone (I did not have a lock combo on my phone). My phone worked after being in the river for 2 whole days completely submerged in water. HIGHLY recommend this phone case!
customer_reviews.author: A Customer

customer_reviews.title: I left it like that until I decided it was worth replacing
customer_reviews.text: This is my third of these type cases over the last 5 years. The tab that covers the charger connection broke after about 4 months. I left it like that until I decided it was worth replacing. The replacement leaked upon doing the "leak test", and was promptly replaced. Do the water test when you purchase! I have had two of these over the past several years that leaked. These are decent covers. My very first one lasted about 3 years.
customer_reviews.author: ACREATIVECAT

customer_reviews.title: Doesn’t seal as needed for waterproof status
customer_reviews.text: I purchased the case mainly for the waterproof standing. The case doesn’t have a large enough edge to hold onto itself and as such leads to small areas of separation along one side. It also causes issues with being heard on phone calls. Too bad, though, as it really has potential.
customer_reviews.author: Duckwheat

customer_reviews.title: A disappointment
customer_reviews.text: 3 Star because bottom line it did protect my phone from damage. However, I was overall very disappointed in this purchase. It muted sound so that I kept my phone at full volume but couldn’t always hear well. Initial test showed that it was watertight, but very shortly after I started using it, it wouldn’t stay snapped together. Any drop would pop open the case and it was difficult to get it to snap back together. It also impeded the touch screen, mostly in the left lower corner. I put up with it as long as I could but just replaced it after a few months of use.
customer_reviews.author: K. Fisch

customer_reviews.title: Starting to think life proof is the only way...
customer_reviews.text: This is an iPhone 7 case. There is a covered up headphone jack on the bottom. Doesn’t fit 8 right. Screen sensitivity is bad with the case fully snapped on. Volume knob looks like it is about to fall off and does not work. Disappointing. The lanyard doesn’t even fit. This is my 4th attempt to purchase a functioning iPhone 8 case.
customer_reviews.author: Jordan B

customer_reviews.title: Would of been great but it’s scratched.
customer_reviews.text: I recently bought a new phone and I was looking for a phone case that would protect it. After looking at reviews I was very pleased with this case. After receiving it immidoagely I noticed the strap that comes with it already had the nylon string unraveling. The back of the clear case was scratched even though it had a plastic protective covering. What was the point of putting a protective covering if your going to send out scratched cases. Really disappointed since it had great reviews and the case is a wicked sturdy waterproof case.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Case failed to protect screen
customer_reviews.text: Unfoetunately this case did not adequately protect my phone. When my phone slipped out of my hands with the case on, it ended up with a crack in the screen on one of the upper corners. I’ve only had this case for about a month or so and never tested the phone with case in water conditions.
customer_reviews.author: Luna

customer_reviews.title: Great product!
customer_reviews.text: I tested it before putting my phone in. It was underwater for more than an hour and the inside remained dry. And, it looks really nice!
customer_reviews.author: BestLifePublications

customer_reviews.title: This works and fits the iPhone 8 good. The sound after you put it on is ...
customer_reviews.text: This works and fits the iPhone 8 good. The sound after you put it on is horrible. Kind of hard to get on the phone. The vibration/ring knob is not the best. I think will return this one.
customer_reviews.author: 100degrees

customer_reviews.title: I have used lifeproof cases since getting my first iPhone ...
customer_reviews.text: I have used lifeproof cases since getting my first iPhone. This case appears to be just as well made. The thumbprint cover has more area attached than the lifeproof so it will probably last longer, but in my experience that is the weak point in this style case. The first thing I did once the phone was encased was to make a call, and they had no problem hearing me clearly. You can’t beat it for the cost, especially with a one year warranty.
customer_reviews.author: Justin Schaeffer

customer_reviews.title: It kept my phone in silent mode
customer_reviews.text: I was disappointed that I couldn't use this case because, when installed, it kept my phone in silent mode. When I connected the top to the bottom it moved the silent toggle to the on position and it can't be moved to the off position. I tried multiple times to get it to close without this happening.
customer_reviews.author: MaryKaye

customer_reviews.title: don't bother
customer_reviews.text: The first case I bought had scratches all over the screen, indicating that it had definitely been used. I chose to get a replacement instead of a refund, & the second one came with the seal out of it.I have no clue about the durability, sturdiness, and water resistance, but the material it was made of seemed to be of inferior quality.
customer_reviews.author: Susan

customer_reviews.title: Not waterproof
customer_reviews.text: This is not waterproof. I jumped in the pool and it filled up with water. Cute for water resistance and you can insert an image but yeah don’t go swimming w it
customer_reviews.author: maryelizabeth stanton

customer_reviews.title: great item I love this!
customer_reviews.text: Saved my iPhone when I dropped it in a water puddle! but the waterproof case not just protect the iPhone from water. it also protected from the dropping. it protects iPhone 360 degree. great item I love this!
customer_reviews.author: naomi

customer_reviews.title: Happy with purchase
customer_reviews.text: This waterproof case is surprisingly good quality. I tested it in water it works great. Well made,quality materials, fits phone securely,easy to install. Protect phone if drop. I will obviously by it to my wife too.
customer_reviews.author: sharma_mk

customer_reviews.title: doesn't stay together very well at all, the screen ...
customer_reviews.text: doesn't stay together very well at all, the screen protector is very weak. Over all it might be worth 99 cents but not the price they sell for.
customer_reviews.author: scott noble

customer_reviews.title: Three Stars
customer_reviews.text: Seemed to get filmy quickly, but kept my phone dray after a day at the waterpark!
customer_reviews.author: Sarah

customer_reviews.title: GREAT GREAT Case for value
customer_reviews.text: GREAT GREAT Case for value, except it is so water tight the air also seals and voices echo.. have to keep charging point dangling open to avoid the echo
customer_reviews.author: AzzaLu

customer_reviews.title: DONT WASTE YOUR MONEY!!!!
customer_reviews.text: Please do not purchase this case!!!! •it fits way to tight. •you can see a gap between the case where it snaps together •wasn’t put together when shipped.
customer_reviews.author: Phillips Family

customer_reviews.title: Horrible.
customer_reviews.text: Every time I tried to talk with someone on the phone I had to yell so they could hear me. I only used it until I could get another case.
customer_reviews.author: David Tondreau

customer_reviews.title: Very nice product, durable and gets the job done
customer_reviews.text: Very nice product, durable and gets the job done. I'll use this when I go to the pool or to the river this summer. Just a nice basic phone cover!
customer_reviews.author: Chalee A. George

customer_reviews.title: Does not close on the side
customer_reviews.text: The case does not fit! I’ve tried everything to close it on the right side! But It stays on even though it doesn’t close, and I have dropped it about a million times and no cracks!!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Crap
customer_reviews.text: Cheaply made. Doesn’t have a mechanism to turn on or off ringer.
customer_reviews.author: Matthew kreibick

customer_reviews.title: Not what I hoped for
customer_reviews.text: There were limited instructions. The sound on off button cover did not work. I could not get the keys to seal along the top of the phone.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Waterproof case worked awesome. I was able to have my phone in ...
customer_reviews.text: Waterproof case worked awesome. I was able to have my phone in the pool without any damage. It did muffle my speaker capibilities.
customer_reviews.author: Jacquel

customer_reviews.title: Speaker sound muffled
customer_reviews.text: Bought this as a “just in case” waterproof case. Pleased with the colors and construction. easy to put on but speaker sound is muffled and noticed the most when using speaker phone.
customer_reviews.author: AB123

customer_reviews.title: Not worth the money
customer_reviews.text: Got this for my husband like a week ago maybe? Idk not long ago and it’s already breaking.
customer_reviews.author: Anna Abraham

customer_reviews.title: Great for vacation!
customer_reviews.text: Bought it so I didnt need to worry about bringing it in the pool/ocean when on my girls trip! Was awesome! I didnt swim or submerge it too much bc I was still nervous. But At least I didnt need to worry about splashes
customer_reviews.author: Kristina A. Scalfano

customer_reviews.title: mute button and the speakers were terrible.
customer_reviews.text: I didn’t like the case because the toggle for the mute/un-mute was not working. It was broken and I had to throw the case away. It was ineffective and felt that I didn’t get what I bargained for.
customer_reviews.author: Lewis

customer_reviews.title: it's useless. Charge phone while in case
customer_reviews.text: Great case EXCEPT you have to remove it to charge the phone. Extremely hard to remove and since you have to remove it to charge phone useless.
customer_reviews.author: Tess Knight

customer_reviews.title: Not water proof
customer_reviews.text: Cute case but not water proof. Good thing my phone was water resistant.
customer_reviews.author: Antheknee Brown

customer_reviews.title: 4 STAR PRODUCT
customer_reviews.text: When received, fell in love with the product. Durable and water proof. Although after a couple weeks of having the item, it did start to break and the plastic screen fell out.
customer_reviews.author: Rylee wild

customer_reviews.title: THIS SUCKS DO NOT BUY
customer_reviews.text: This was a WASTE OF MONEY! I don’t not recommend this item at all. I did the water test TWICE just to make sure I wasn’t crazy but it actually does not work. I’m glad I did not bring this on vacation with me!
customer_reviews.author: Asia McGee

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Worked perfectly. I couldn’t get the strap to connect but besides that it was perfect
customer_reviews.author: AshLee

customer_reviews.title: DOES NOT WORK
customer_reviews.text: HORRIBLE. It is not waterproof ! My phone got destroyed after using this case in and by the water. I might as well bought a lifeproof case with the amount of money I used to buy a new phone!
customer_reviews.author: Kristina Leli

customer_reviews.title: Would recommend.
customer_reviews.text: Have always been a life proof customer. Gave his a shot and couldn’t be happier with it. Waterproof and a little more slim than the life proof equivalent.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Bad product
customer_reviews.text: Every time I call someone they can’t hear me and it sounds like I’m in a tunnel until I take the case off. Dropped my phone and the case broke and my phone cracked. Horrible phone case.
customer_reviews.author: John P.

customer_reviews.title: Trouble hearing me
customer_reviews.text: I like that it is light weight and durable. But I don’t like that people are having a hard time hearing me on the phone. It is very frustrating.
customer_reviews.author: miguel

customer_reviews.title: Do not buy! Durability is short and limited
customer_reviews.text: The back of the case already broke, had it 7 months, will not stay connected to the front half of the case
customer_reviews.author: Jozsef Rebek

customer_reviews.title: It keeps popping up it won’t stay on my phone
customer_reviews.text: It’s a piece of **** it doesn’t even fit my phone
customer_reviews.author: jenny l.

customer_reviews.title: it works
customer_reviews.text: Kept my phone safe and waterproof in Hawaii! But it was difficult to take calls with it on.
customer_reviews.author: Selina xiong

customer_reviews.title: Won't stay shut
customer_reviews.text: The case seemed fine but then we realized it will not stay shut. It keeps popping open. So water proof is out the window.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Three Stars
customer_reviews.text: People complain they cannot hear me when I try to have a phone conversation with the case on.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Says “VAPESOON” in big letters on back....did not expect print on phone case
customer_reviews.text: Was ecstatic about the phone case until I opened the packaging and saw “VAPESOON” in big letters on the back of the case, which I did not expect.
customer_reviews.author: Jordan Floyd

customer_reviews.title: Good but not durable
customer_reviews.text: Signs of wear and tear already show after a couple of months - cracks on back of phone case.
customer_reviews.author: IreneAA

customer_reviews.title: Do yourself a favor and get a better
customer_reviews.text: The price on this case is cheap but you get what you pay for, mute button broke, tab for the rubber gromit on the charging port broke and makes it so people can barely hear me when I’m talking, Do yourself a favor and get a better case
customer_reviews.author: Shaun Shecora

customer_reviews.title: Spend a few more bucks and get something better
customer_reviews.text: People have a hard time hearing me with the case on if I am FaceTiming. Or using speaker.
customer_reviews.author: Kendall O.

customer_reviews.title: Wrong product
customer_reviews.text: I got an iPhone 6 case instead of an iPhone 8 case. What should I do! Need my money back
customer_reviews.author: Weritainvisible

customer_reviews.title: Would not recommend for the
customer_reviews.text: It fit my iPhone 7 with a bit of a struggle, but the case wouldn't even close on my iPhone 8. Would not recommend for the 8
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Hate it
customer_reviews.text: Not satisfied with it the blocker for the charging port broke after 2 day and it sometimes can’t pick up my finger
customer_reviews.author: Samya DeAndrade

customer_reviews.title: Won’t completely close
customer_reviews.text: The case won’t fully close because of the rubber peice making it water proof. Other then that no complaints
customer_reviews.author: champane

customer_reviews.title: Best quality
customer_reviews.text: Bought for my 12 yr old and it is durable
customer_reviews.author: Lissette Wesby

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: Awful. Broke within a week. Sound knob is infuriating and now broken.
customer_reviews.author: Bee

customer_reviews.title: Not water proof
customer_reviews.text: The case does not stay on and it failded the water proof test before my phone went in it.
customer_reviews.author: Ryan Manzi

customer_reviews.title: Terrible for Iphone8
customer_reviews.text: This case broke within a week of me having it. It barely fit my IPhone8
customer_reviews.author: taquirah

customer_reviews.title: For buy it
customer_reviews.text: The case broke easily so now it’s not waterproof anymore!!!
customer_reviews.author: Sebastian

customer_reviews.title: DON’T BUY
customer_reviews.text: WAY TOO SMALL!! I can’t even put the case on my phone!
customer_reviews.author: Lydia Dazet

customer_reviews.title: Good looking and Good quality
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this for my friends. She loves it. It is a good case and easy to use. Protect well! Fit well! I strongly recommend this case.
customer_reviews.author: Xiaolin Zhao

customer_reviews.title: Good protection for a great price.
customer_reviews.text: My daughter likes it she said she has no complaints about it.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Beware cover may not stay shut
customer_reviews.text: Was fine for short time then noticed case would not stay closed after several times reseating it...thankfully I didn’t try water test.
customer_reviews.author: Bill Stowell

customer_reviews.title: This case are very suitable for the phone. I ...
customer_reviews.text: This case are very suitable for the phone. I can use the case when I went to the hot spring. It can protect the phone very well.
customer_reviews.author: shushuyiyi

customer_reviews.title: Used and dirty
customer_reviews.text: It arrived used and filthy- clearly not new and there was hair in the box.
customer_reviews.author: Jojo

customer_reviews.title: Looks good but it has a Design flaw- Do Not Buy in my opinion.
customer_reviews.text: Initial thoughts, "This case is awesome". It looked good and it was sturdy. But it has a design flaw in my opinion. Your voice is muffled to the other callers. As soon as I used it, I was hearing complaints from the other callers about the quality of sounds from my side. They couldn't hear me clearly or my voice was going in and out. I had to use the head phones. Thankfully, amazon has a great customer service and my money was refunded.
customer_reviews.author: S. Thomas

customer_reviews.title: Great for beach or skiing but kinda bulky for everyday ...
customer_reviews.text: Great for beach or skiing but kinda bulky for everyday use. Muffles the sound but keeps the phone dry as a bone underwater. So it does everything its supposed to do perfectly but like I said, may not be for everyday use.
customer_reviews.author: Dave Watson

customer_reviews.title: Good while it lasted
customer_reviews.text: It was good fir 5 months of use, then I noticed water penetrated through the case at a waterpark.
customer_reviews.author: KK

customer_reviews.title: My son loved it
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my son. He loved it! The only problem that he has encountered is the facing does not always detect his "swiping" motion. So he's been having to swipe slowly across. Other than that, he's extremely happy with it.
customer_reviews.author: D R

customer_reviews.title: Durable case a must have
customer_reviews.text: The case fits great. I like the plug for the charger, it seems to be staying in place and durable. The screen protector works efficiently, no delays in regards to touch or picking up sound when on a call. Would recommend!!
customer_reviews.author: francis

customer_reviews.title: Hello...can you hear me?
customer_reviews.text: This product definitely seals out EVERYTHING...including sound! Had to end up throwing his away because of all of the complaints I got from people on the other end of the phone. garbage.
customer_reviews.author: Danielle

customer_reviews.title: Great case!
customer_reviews.text: Great case. No problem hearing or being heard. Hard to open, but it should be.
customer_reviews.author: Ame

customer_reviews.title: Eh
customer_reviews.text: It’s ok, but tight, haven’t tested in water but doesn’t look too trustworthy
customer_reviews.author: jorge castaneda

customer_reviews.title: The product works as intended.
customer_reviews.text: Good solid product.easy to install at a really good price .
customer_reviews.author: Charles Cahill

customer_reviews.title: Love the way this item looks BUT I can’t charge ...
customer_reviews.text: Love the way this item looks BUT I can’t charge my phone while it is in the case. So disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Not happy!!
customer_reviews.text: Won’t fit my iPhone 8 because of the round knob - can’t figure that out!! Sending back!
customer_reviews.author: REP

customer_reviews.title: Fail
customer_reviews.text: My screen cracked despite my phone being inside this case and in my pocket. Do not buy.
customer_reviews.author: Rob Smith

customer_reviews.title: It doesn't really fit the iPhone 8, the case ...
customer_reviews.text: It doesn't really fit the iPhone 8, the case doesn't close all the way so I can't use it in the water. Lets see if it really is shockproof.
customer_reviews.author: Itzayana

customer_reviews.title: Good Case
customer_reviews.text: I just got this case out of the mail and I love it, except there is no way to put my phone on vibrate or take it off vibrate when I need to
customer_reviews.author: Eric Jenkins

customer_reviews.title: Worked well. Took some muscle to get the thing ...
customer_reviews.text: Worked well. Took some muscle to get the thing closed, but once we got it closed, it kept her phone safe at the beach for a week.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Questionable case
customer_reviews.text: Had this for a few months and it spilt. Cant close it. Doesnt work anymore
customer_reviews.author: Beth

customer_reviews.title: Works well, some chargers don’t fit though
customer_reviews.text: Very detailed instructions on what to do prior to using the case. (To ensure it’s air tight) very easy to put on. (Use a penny to take off/the tool it came with) I’ve had no issues with the screen, or the finger print scanner working. Some chargers fit with the case, others do not. The dongle does fit with case All In all satisfied for the price.
customer_reviews.author: Autumn L. Malone
